title: Response to Papp et al, "Efficacy and safety of ESK-001, a highly selective, oral allosteric TYK2 inhibitor, in patients with moderate-to-severe plaque psoriasis: 52-week results from the long-term phase 2 study in patients who participated in the phase 2 STRIDE study".
